item.title: Will the FCA's greenwashing crackdown actually help investors?
item.author: dailymail.co.uk
item.description:
- New rules are set to help investors trust that greener investments are legitimate
Friday marks the conclusion of the COP 29 climate summit, which for many years has marked an important date in the diary of global finance leaders.
But almost two weeks of global warming pontification in Baku appe...
